description:
Protect your Ooni Karu 12 from the elements in between uses, or bring it to the pizza party without getting the rest of your gear sooty.

  • Burly polyester is fully waterproof
  • Works as a bag to transport your oven or as a cover if you want to leave it setup outside
  • Padded carry handles for easy transport
name: Ooni Karu 12 Carry Cover
